description:
Gameplay Instructions: Controls:

Left Mouse Button - move to the location clicked

For battles, click the middle of the circle at the right time (When the outer ring is in the blue ring) to be successful. 

Green = Pass 

Red = Fail.

For Dialogue, click anywhere on the screen

To talk with slimes, click on them and only when the player is close to them will the dialogue start.

Objective:

Beat all the slimes (3) to get their keys and beat the slime boss waiting inside the door at the top of the map.
